data.eml:eml: Type designations for sap beetles in the subfamily Carpophilinae Erichson (Coleoptera: Nitidulidae) housed in the Natural History Museum, London

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Powell, Gareth S., Martin, Gavin J. (2019): Type designations for sap beetles in the subfamily Carpophilinae Erichson (Coleoptera: Nitidulidae) housed in the Natural History Museum, London. Zootaxa 4590 (2): 297-300, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4590.2.8
